website_summaries.verdict: A highly reputable carpet cleaner for professional level results. Deep cleans dirt, stains, and odors while leaving behind a pleasant smell.
pros: Top choice by longtime carpet cleaning consumers
Scotchgard protection keeps carpets stain resistant
Concentrate twice as powerful as other leading formulas
EPA evaluated as a Safer Choice for pets and families
cons: Only for upright deep cleaning machines
Better results when used with a Bissell machine

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing..
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing...I did attempt to use some leftover Rug doctor formula and it did not get my carpets as clean. I was using a Bissell Pet Pro 2x. This stuff got my carpet and sofa clean. Notice the picture of the clean sofa, the carpet underneath was also cleaned with this formula. The smell is strong but dissipates after about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Owens

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased. I did not take before and after pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. I am pleased. I did not take before and after pictures as I should have. But I know every tank of water I emptied was disgusting and I vaccume routinely every three days(we have dogs) I'd recommend this over the rug Doctor stuff bc I used the rug Doctor crap first and it did absolutely nothing.. Switched over to this it's started pulling up dirt? Lol I don't know what was in the carpet but enough to make you want to clean them more often
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS
customer_reviews.text: I USUALLY DONT USE CARPET CLEANING SOLUTION IN MY CLEANER, I JUST USE LIQUID LAUNDRY SOAP AND FABRIC SOFTNER. BUT I FOUND OUT THATS WHAT DAMAGED MY MACHINE AND I HAD TO BUY ANOTHER ONE. THIS CLEANING SOLUTION DID THE JOB ALL BY ITS SELF I COULDNT BELIEVE HOW CLEAN MY CARPET CAME AND I DIDNT HAVE TO REPEAT GOING OVER THE STAINS MULTIPLE TIMES. WHEN ITS TIME TO CLEAN MY CARPET AGAIN I WILL REPURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Quite effective!
customer_reviews.text: We saw some other reviews saying this Bissell Deep Clean Pro 4x was the best, so we figured we'd give it a shot. We've got two dogs large breed dogs, and two cats. It feels horrible saying it, but using this fluid did to our carpet what a power washer does to a dirty sidewalk. The difference was night and day! I've since bought a few more bottles so I can keep a good stock for more cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Pat K.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell you if it's the machine, soap, or both, but dang did it get dirt off my couch I didn't know was there. Not to mention the rug you see. If you look at the snake in the middle you can tell the difference. And let me just say... The pic doesn't do it justice. I wish I had gotten a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: Tried many carpet cleaners..
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different carpet cleaners. I have two dogs that still seem to think that carpet is grass and like to pee on it when I'm at work. However, this cleaner works miracles! I've tried many different shampoos for my carpet but this is the only one so far that has been able to get the pee smell out of the carpet. Also, with previous carpet shampoos, the dogs would still return to their "favorite" pee spots in the house. They have not done so with this. This has a very minimal cleaning smell, but I will be buying this product again for any carpet cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Reese

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for both area rugs/carpets and upholstery
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST carpet cleaner on the market. I have blue area rug with WHITE accents and an orange area rug with white dots. Visually, my area rugs did not look that dirty, but after cleaning with this product, the water in my carpet machine looked like chocolate milk and my area rugs were super clean!!! I would also highly recommend this for upholstery. Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ania Broz-St

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found/used this once. Now I'll use it forever.
customer_reviews.text: I will only buy this specific cleaner for the rest of my life. Raising 2 puppies and a male dog who was jealous of them almost destroyed my carpet. But this used with the Bissel big Green giant, or whatever it's called, it got to the point where I didn't even have to pick up the piles of poop anymore. I'd just run it over and it cleaned everything perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works Great W/Bissell Products
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a little strong for my liking, and getting the measurements right takes a certain amount of skill, but if you want a deep clean and if you want to keep your Bissell machine in tip-top shape, then you basically have to get their special soap. Don't get me wrong, it works great, I just wish I could use other soaps, this just seems really chemical-y. BTW, I did try using other soaps and it left residue on the inside of the shampooer, it got really gross and it's super hard to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Did not quite leave my carpets looking like new
customer_reviews.text: After my dog caught a stomach bug not once, but twice a couple weeks apart, for my own peace of mind, I needed to bust out the big guns. I chose this product because of the impressive before and after photos. I will say that it did a good job, but definitely not a great job. I was expecting a little more oomph, but am still pleased with its performance compared to similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with the SpotClean Pro
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing my Spot Clean Pro this item was an option to purchase along with the machine. When we received the bottle there was a huge sticker on the front stating for use with upright models only not for use with the spot cleaner we actually purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner To Use With Your Bissell
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Bissell carpet cleaner and used this formula. The cleaners works well and leaves your carpet smelling fresh. The concentrate goes a long way so you can expect this bottle to last a while. If you're looking for a really good commercial grade carpet cleaner, try the Bissell ProHeat 2x Revolution. Works extremely well for cleaning up after your pets. Leaves the carpet looking brand new and well groomed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan1117

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good I would use it on my hair if I had some
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Bissell Carpet Cleaner and wanted to make sure I bought the shampoo to go with it. Couldn't be happier with this shampoo. It smells fantastic and does an amazing job on the carpets. Somebody said just use a Tide pod in it instead (I laughed) no way am I going to void a warranty because of not using the intended shampoo. I was able to do a 1500 sqft house on one bottle (48 ounces).
customer_reviews.author: Fil-Am Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for high-traffic areas.
customer_reviews.text: I have a light colored, expensive oriental rug that had ground in foot traffic dirt. This has removed them better than anything I've tried yet. I will clean the rug again in hopes of removing the ground in dirt entirely. Hopefully it does or it's time for a new rug and a new hubby! Just kidding. {{wink}}
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: If you are sensitive to odors, do not purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are sensitive to odors, do not purchase this product. The smell is overpowering and remains in the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, inefficient machine. So soap product not necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Soap product unnecessary. We're on our 4th Bissell machine, one our purchase and 3 replacements from Bissell. They are JUNK. Work once and then you end up with wet floors because the machine no longer picks up the soap and water. I'm afraid it may have damaged our sub-flooring, certainly it ruined our carpets and forces us to sop up wet floors so pets can have a dry environment. NOT PET FRIENDLY...junk is best description of a Bissell. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: The best carpet shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My dog pees on the carpet all the time. This stuff takes it out of the carpet consistently every time. It makes ratty carpets look much, much better. It is highly concentrated. I live in an apartment and use this about once a month, and before moving out, on the entire carpet. I have never had an issue with the security deposit once. Despite overall being a pretty grimy person with 2 dogs. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey C

customer_reviews.title: Really does work better than any other shampoo cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: Really does work better than any other shampoo cleaner out there. I have been shampooing carpets for over 18 years, this by far is the best shampoo out there. Also has a very pleasant scent.(notice I don't say smell) leaves your carpet clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Addict

customer_reviews.title: Carpets came out ckean and smell great
customer_reviews.text: I am retired from commercial maintence this bissell cleaner is better than the solutions my company used.. The house and carpets smell fresh. My carpet my really bad 4 roommates and 2 dogs did there work on my carpet. I really was sure the carpets in my house would not get clean. They look excellent . Thanks bissell you saved me money. No need to replace .
customer_reviews.author: Jerry  Badalamento

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this solution. A little bit goes a long way. It smells fresh, but not overbearing. I didn't take a before and after picture of my livingroom carpet, but I will take some for the rest of my carpet. I do have one new stain in the livingroom that I'm going to tackle later. I'll post pictures of all of it soon. Definitely buy this solution. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great value, really gets the carpet super clean as long as you use the right machine I am using the bissell pro heat machine. The smell of the cleaner is not bad at all. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: TONY & Talisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could be less complicated.
customer_reviews.text: I fail to understand the purpose of gussying up detergent bottles. Please consider better design for long term storage footprint. Bottle should be rectangular with easy pour handle. No need for flashy color or branding if it works it works. Product should be cheaper by about $10. Fire designer and use engineer container sample.
customer_reviews.author: Price Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carpet cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.text: Having just bought the new Bissell Big Green Machine, I wanted to use the best product in my new investment. I chose this cleaner because it contains Scotch Guard . Really cleaned my carpets and I liked the clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dee, from Defiance

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but doesn't meet the hype for performance
customer_reviews.text: Tried a number of products for our carpet cleaning machines. This one doesn't do very much, Hoover Professional is FAR SUPERIOR! This smells nice, but very disappointed at how it performs. Pass. Cleaning carpets is a very laborious and time consuming job; you need a product that works; this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased - changed color, but also texture of carpet
customer_reviews.text: I used this on half my carpet (the dirty part). The carpet has changed color, and is now a darker brown, but more concerning is that the carpet is fussier on the spot where it's been cleaned. Very odd looking. Almost like the cleaner messed up the texture somehow. I used other cleaners and it didn't do this.
customer_reviews.author: retro_r

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: We shampooed our carpets a few months ago with other cleaner but were not too happy with the result. This cleaner really pulled up all the dirt in the kids room and got the dark spots out of the beige carpet. It's great for spot cleaning too! My daughter got purple permanent marker on the carpet and this cleaner pulled it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have used other brands and they have been okay. Now we have tried this, we will not use any other. We have also invested in the bissel spot clean to use in conjuction with this. Worth it's weight in gold as we have a toddler and pets, jncluding a dog who is afraid of rain, hello inside pee amd carpets upstairs. This cleaner and the spot cleaner are keeping out beige carpet beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: The carpet in the apt. Where I live. The carpet is at least 13+ yrs. Old!! Bad color of carpet for apt. Rentals in my opinion, beige.. Carpet looked and smelled very good although, within maybe 3mos. OR so, stains came back up. I think the stains are from the backing of the carpet as there is No pad!!!! DOES BISSELL, HAVE A PRODUCT THAT CAN HELP TO PULL THE DEEP DOWN STAINS(. (IE) FROM BACKING AS WELL,??? I DO RECOMMEND BISSELL BE PRODUCTS, THAT IS ALL I WILL USE.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great--Use Sparingly!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased thefor my fraternity. While the machine did come with cleaning solution, I knew we would need more than was provided. This cleaning solution is excellent! It leaves carpets with crisp colors and a fresh, clean scent. There was no issues with color fastness on any of the carpets I used this product on. Just be aware that, in this case "less is more" and I found great success using one capful of this solution in the Big Green Deep Cleaning Machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful with how much solution you are putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful with how much solution you are putting in your cleaner. I put way too much because I did not follow the instructions for the 2X formula. It left a lot of soapy residue but I am going to rinse my carpet tonight with just water in my carpet cleaner and that should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The carpets in the condo that we moved into to were fifty. The entire Bissell line work great. This concentrated shampoo is fabulous. It removed stains that were probably 14 years old. No kidding. Highly recommend the entire Bissell carpet cleaning line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Does better than any cleaner I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Great for carpet with puppy stains. I’ve used Resolve (not recommended) and other brands, but this cleaner came with my new shampooer and I was so impressed so purchased a large bottle. It cleans puppy urine stains without changing the color of your carpet. Recommended highly!
customer_reviews.author: Els

customer_reviews.title: this stuff will embarrass you...
customer_reviews.text: Wowee. This stuff will embarrass you after showing you the amount of dirt hiding in your carpet. I'm using this with a Royal Pro-Series UltraSpin carpet cleaner and in some areas the water being sucked up looks like mud. The scent is light and airy and fairly strong, which I like. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: gwp

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is B-E-A-UTIFUL!!! This stuff is UNREAL!!! This stuff is ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE!!! I cannot stress enough how impressed I am. My first bottle just arrived today, and I already added another bottle to my cart for future use. Absolutely worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Frothy Mess
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it as much as the Bissell commercial-complete I used side-by-side. This 2X frothed pretty heavily, so much so that I had to shut down the BigGreen shampooer before my clean water tank was empty, because it was starting to suck suds into the top of the vacuum. Smell was similar to the commercial-complete, but I'd give the heavy-soil cutting edge to the commercial-complete (which never frothed) over this. And, yes, I used twice as much of the commercial soap versus this 2X for every water tank load, but the commercial didn't froth.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: What a job!!
customer_reviews.text: This is something I read about before purchasing here because I needed to clean a hallway. I like the pet products for those areas and thought maybe the hallway needed a bit more attention. My hallway was so bad that you could see where everyone walked. I didn't pretreat it at all, which would probably have helped with more stains. However, the way this cleaned the hallway and stairs! I'm greatly impressed. I plan on using it on the whole house where I used the pet stuff to see if it may be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this worked better than the sample formula that came with the Bissell ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this worked better than the sample formula that came with the Bissell cleaner since I didn't try both but I had really difficult stains and wanted to make sure the cleaner got them. This doesn't smell bad and worked very very well. I'm glad I bought it just in case, plus it will come in handy for future cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: jinx10000

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and another product to go with a carpet cleaner I purchased for my son and daughter-in-law. This is a great product. My son and daughter-in-law loved how well it worked, as well as the fresh smell that lingered after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Margret N.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I used in my Bissell carpet cleaner and it did a superior job cleaning and deodorizing kid and dog areas. It has a light clean scent that does not linger on. A versatile product that will make your carpet clean and fresh again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miccio

customer_reviews.title: Only type I use
customer_reviews.text: I try them all. Seriously. I am a carpet cleaning fanatic. I live in a condo yet have a carpet steam cleaner (which I have no room to store it) but I am crazy about keeping my carpets clean. This works the best for insane me.
customer_reviews.author: RMG

customer_reviews.title: Good product...cleans dog stains, just too $$
customer_reviews.text: Does the job...cleans dog stains after accidents (pee or vomit). Might take just a couple passes, but no more than that. Equipped with a good bissell cleaner and you should be good to go with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JB123

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is light, sleek and easy to use. Maneuvering the clean and dirty water tanks for refilling/emptying is easy and the results are amazing. The cost to me was equal to four machine rentals, which are not available in my area anyway right now due to Covid. It is nice to have my own shampooer so that I do not have to do all of the carpet and rugs in a hurry. I am so glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've used so far.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans really well. The scent is pleasant and mild and doesn't aggravate my asthma. I cleaned a small section and the difference between that and the part I didn't do yet is quite noticeable, even after it dried.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Its does not deep clean and for sure its not recommended for a rug in a high traffic home. It does not clean the rug. Its very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as the expensive stuff at the rental shop or the store!! I am very happy with this. I used for cleaning my rental this week. Worked great and left a nice smell. Took the red clay stains off the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Mattel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to rinse- does not get all sudsy like some cleaning solutions where u have to rinse a million times to get it out of the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an rv and I washed the carpet, came out like new.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Smells fantastically clean, and cleans fantastically! I was really impressed with how it pulled all of the dirt and nastiness and dog puke (🤮) out of my almost white colored couch and loveseat set. Damn!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally Powerful Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally powerful cleaner. Leaves fabric with a very pleasant odor. For best results use distilled water. Applies Scotch Guard protectant as it cleans. Expensive but worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Steward H.

customer_reviews.title: Brand name quality
customer_reviews.text: Use it a few times already in my portable unit. Mixed with hot water it does a great job getting out set in stains on automotive interiors. Better than the stuff that came with the unit and better than the generic stuff I used last time. Stick with the brand name. Bissell makes good products
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Keyes

customer_reviews.title: best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this for spot cleaning. I have a 13 year old cat. She has frequent accidents. This cleans up great! I have also rented rug cleaners and works great there as well.
customer_reviews.author: smanyhoofs

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great
customer_reviews.text: I have the Bissell ProHeat 2x. This product works excellent. Our carpets weren’t too bad because we don’t wear shoes on it, but I do have 3 kids and this is the 1st cleaning in 2yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Love this Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product does an excellent job of getting soil out of carpets. I thought I needed to replace our family room carpet but it turned out amazing. Also like the fact that the scent / fragrance is mild. NOT into strong smells!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Riordan-Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Carpet refresh!! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in our Bissell pet pro 2 machine and loved it! We don’t have any stains but do have dogs so the carpet just smelled funky. Followed the directions and shampooed away. I will definitely be repurchasing. My carpets smell great and and feel great now I don’t have to worry about my now crawling 6 month old being on dirty carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best Carpet Shampoo for Bissel Cleaners
customer_reviews.text: Been using this formula for years and it works great getting out urine, stains and dirt. Just need a little as it goes a long way. Smells great and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Have used it so far for spot cleaning pet messes on the carpet. It’s done a good job although one spot has some residual staining. Next step is to try it in my new carpet cleaner. I’m hopeful it will the spot and neutralize any smell.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleaner for your carpets
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Bissell carpet cleaner. It removed some soil that Stanley Steemer professionals didn't get out. I will use this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Joey the K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carpet cleaner because I have an 11-year-old Dachshund that recently started going potty on the carpet. I have beige carpet, and I tried EVERYTHING to get the stains out. So, I researched and found this. I added to to my carpet scrubber and went over my carpets twice. It left a really lovely smell that wasn't overpowering, and it pulled up the stains wonderfully! You don't need a lot per tank of water either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to follow instructions and start cleaning the carpet in my home. It’s well worth the money and I’ll save a lot by doing the cleaning myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynefromslo

customer_reviews.title: Only did half the job
customer_reviews.text: This worked great as a carpet cleaner and spot I needed clean LOOKS great. However it did nothing for the odor. The spot still smells like urine even after using it twice over the spot on the same day the mess was made! I would use this again but only as a carpet cleaner. I will need to find something else to entirely erase pet stains.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Gave my carpets a deep clean and left them smelling so clean. Has a nice clean scent not to overpowering. Would definitely recommend this product. Works very well especially in the high traffic areas.
customer_reviews.author: Chris silva

customer_reviews.title: Works well, smells great
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a delicate stomach. This product did a great job removing her stomach contents from our "Pet Protect" carpeting. It also did a great job on the high traffic areas in the hall and on the stairs. It smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Even with 2 adults in our house who are very careful, everyone knows a carpet can get dirty, especially in the traffic zone. This stuff is amazing!!! I wet the carpet first, then took my Hoover Max Carpet cleaner over. In just a few passes, the spots disappeared. The traffic area took a little more attention, but the stains did come out. I even cleaned my braided runner just inside out front door. BAM! Clean. Love this stuff. Will never buy anything else. Posting pictures to show the result. Mine is the tan rug and brown floral sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stouch

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I clean my carpets once a year, and I always use this cleaner because I have a Bissell machine. I have had good luck with this as it gets y carpets really clean.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA SENOUR

customer_reviews.title: Clean bright carpets and a fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Considering the before and after shots (mental only; next time I'll take actual) it has obviously been too long since I last cleaned the carpets. Thankfully this very effective cleaner made up for my lax behavior by not only cleaning and brightening the entire carpet but by visually undefining areas normally considered high traffic (you know, the parts you look at with frustration).
customer_reviews.author: StealthMode

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing and leaves your carpet smelling fresh and clean for a long time. I’m going to purchase a second bottle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: We have a white and cream carpet as well as two kids under 5 a bunny and a 70lb golden doodle and the carpet cleaned up to brand new
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Works gr8 with Bissel Big Green
customer_reviews.text: This along with the bissel big geeen saved our carpets. The smell and clean was a lot better than previous professional cleanings. We have soft water too, so we only use 1/2 the amount in the directions
customer_reviews.author: otisraccoon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was my moms 68th birthday and that was her present from me and my kids and considering it didn’t get delivered and said it did.. I’m highly upset.
customer_reviews.author: mesrebeccadeas

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: I have a bissell big green cleaner, the professional one. And with that and this solution you cant go wrong. It will take even the toughest messes out of my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Brunelle

customer_reviews.title: I am man and I clean
customer_reviews.text: Use this for carpet cleaning and it does a good job of getting rid of medium stain. For hard or long time stain this product wont not work. I go into manual hand brush mode for harder stains.
customer_reviews.author: Luc1f3r

customer_reviews.title: Loving This!
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned at least 4 rooms with this cleaner. Perfect for the at home Mom or person who doesn't want to pay a ton of money for a carpet cleaner. I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Vick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He has a bull mastiff that has pee accidents on his carpet when he works overnights. This has helped tremendously with the stains. He uses it many times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a second home. The bottle had a slow leak in it which I discovered after the return window. The bottle leaked out all of its contents. This is the reason I am giving it a low rating--defective packaging. I couldn't tell you how the contents actually worked as they leaked out all over my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The container amount was less than I expected, but I won't use anything else in my Bissell Big Green machine. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sewmom

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cleaning oil spreads on your carpet
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a four stars because it was a good product. However I was expecting a little more cleaning power out of it. We had purchased two of these and couldn’t even finish cleaning a 2b2b apartment. It’s great at cleaning oil spreads on the carpet but not so great to clean the other dirty points.
customer_reviews.author: Jing L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one on accident and meant to buy the febreeze one. I used it anyway and while it didn’t smell as good, it still smelt good and left it clean and fresh! I’ll still buy febreeze next time but for a lighter smell this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Gets most of the job done
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, cleans good, deep cleans not so well. For those hard to get out stains i recommend soaking with this for about 1hr, but for everyday spills and a quick clean it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Great on pee stains!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money!! The scent smells really good and it got out so many pee stains!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Elbert

customer_reviews.title: seems to do a good job
customer_reviews.text: I don't necessarily feel like this is "deep" cleaning, but it does a good job. Did upholstery and rugs with it. I don't love the fragrance, but it's not overpowering, and dissipates as it dries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned out the dog odors from my carpeting with one washing.
customer_reviews.author: Kashi

customer_reviews.title: Really works, removes you pets stains and odor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you have pets, removes that smells and really clean your carpet, I like the scent, very satified with the results
customer_reviews.author: Frank Berducido

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Removing Dirt From Carpet
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful cleaning solution for carpets. I discovered I can reduce the recommended amount in half and still get amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: First purchase of a Bissell cleaner and used the included cleaning formula. Please at the results on the first use, than used it again since my large throw rug has not been cleaned well for a very long time and the first usage brought up a lot of dirt. Used second time next day and got up some more dirt. Now my area rug looks a heck of a lot cleaner. There is no bad odor from the cleaner solution either and I highly recommend this product. Purchased more a few days later.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Cleans well. One bottle will clean a large area. I had this on auto delivery for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sandels

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my entire house with this and my house smelled great and I saw a difference in the carpet strains
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: Bissell product is great!
customer_reviews.text: I used with my old little green steam machine & it’s working great !
customer_reviews.author: Enjoyk-dramas

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a pet who makes mistakes
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how well the shampoo cleaned the carpets after a renter's dog destroyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Carter D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning
customer_reviews.text: When used with the Bissel carpet cleaner, this provided a deeper clean than any other product we tried.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: not compatible
customer_reviews.text: it was sold as a package with the spot clean pro, but it says right on the packaging that it is not compatible with it. waste of time, dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Great deep cleaning. I use this product for our conference center for coffee and food stains and it does the job. Just remember to get to the stains fast while it’s still new!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Product - I have used many different brands to shampoo carpets and rugs. This one smells the best and seams to clean very well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could make a candle of the scent of this cleaner. Really. It works so well and I love the way my house smells after cleaning the rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Powerful Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I can lower the soap dial with this stuff. Cleans pretty good. Smells like a hospital for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Carpet cleaning is like Chiropractors; once you start using them
customer_reviews.text: Carpet cleaning is like Chiropractors; once you start using them, you can never stop. I'm a 68 year old home owner and I've noticed that once you clean a carpet it gets dirty even sooner. Why? Because when you clean a good carpet you remove the stain preventing coating the helps keep the carpet clean. Bissell is the only cleaning agent I've found that restores that stain preventing coating (Scotch Guard). I've waited 30 days since cleaning my carpets and found that my carpets stayed clean for the first time after washing them with Bissell 2X cleaner. This is GOOD stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: We bought with our new Bissell Pet Scrubber This works well and goes after the dirt
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Use in spot remover machine as well as scrubber machine. Works well and when I need a little extra boost, just add a little more product with water.
customer_reviews.author: TWorts

customer_reviews.title: To expensive
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works good. But it’s way to expensive, doesn’t work good enough for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Best carpet shampoo we've ever bought. It lifted dirt and stains, like better than other shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie See

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: I use to clean carpet in pet areas—-does a great job
customer_reviews.author: multiPetMom

product_meta.title: Bissell 78H63 Deep Clean Pro 4X Deep Cleaning Concentrated Carpet Shampoo, 48 ounces - Silver
product_meta.description:
BISSELL Pro Max Clean + Protect Deep Carpet Cleaning Formula is proven unbeatable against all leading formulas with 4X more active ingredients than most other formulas. The deep cleaning formula gives a professional grade clean that is also environmentally responsible and kid and pet friendly. Plus, the added benefit of Scotchgard stain protection safeguards carpets. BISSELL Pro Max Clean + Protect Deep Cleaning Formula maximizes the performance of all leading upright deep cleaning machines, including rentals. Dye and phosphate free with no heavy metals or optical brighteners, this formula is Safer Choice Certified.

Scotchgard is a trademark of 3M.
feature_bullets: Every BISSELL purchase helps save pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Our most powerful formula for tough, ground-in dirt and stains.
Safe on carpet, area rugs and upholstery.
Great for heavily soiled areas, stubborn stains and underlying odors.
Formula made for upright carpet cleaners.
Formula contains no heavy metals, phosphates or dyes. Biodegradable detergent
Safe to use around kids and pets when used as directed.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
